title: Service Fabric TreeView Implementation Pattern
body:
VSCode TreeView implementation for cluster visualization:

- Main provider: serviceFabricClusterView extends vscode.TreeDataProvider<TreeItem>
- TreeItem hierarchy: Cluster → Applications/Nodes/System → Services
- Refresh pattern: Fire onDidChangeTreeData event to trigger view update
- Command registration in extension.ts using registerCommand helper

Key commands:
- sfClusterExplorer.refresh: Refresh tree view
- sfClusterExplorer.sfGetClusters: Load clusters from Azure subscription
- sfClusterExplorer.sfSetClusterEndpoint: Add cluster endpoint
- sfClusterExplorer.sfSetClusterRestCall: Execute adhoc REST query

Tree items use contextValue for command visibility (when clauses in package.json menus).

Always update both the view contribution in package.json and the provider implementation together.
rationale: TreeView pattern is core to the extension UX and must be implemented consistently
